SELECT DISTINCT p.post_id, p.user_id, p.category_id, p.title, p.content, p.image1, p.image2, p.image3, p.status, p.view_count, p.create_time, p.item_info, p.contact_info, u.username, u.avatar, c.name as category_name FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.category_id = #{categoryId} AND p.status = 1

AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM post_tag pt INNER JOIN tag t ON pt.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE pt.post_id = p.post_id AND t.name = '招领' )
ORDER BY p.create_time DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{size}
